name: Oogies Spacepark
description:

    Programmers

    • Artists
  • Yvette Kooke
  • Antijn Van Der Gun
Game summary

You are stuck in an abandoned theme park in the middle of the night, there is no power and no way out. You walk trough the park hoping to find a way out, but wait.. you are not alone! An alien mascotte is patrolling around the park hungry for human blood, and he has smelled yours. The mascotte does not like to be filmed,  luckily you brought your camera with you but you only have one memory card so you'll better use your memory wisely.

Controls
  • Walk around using "W" "A" "S" "D"
  • Start recording by holding "RIGHT MOUS BUTTON"
  • Look around using your mouse
  • Interact with items with "E"
  • Turn your flashlight on/off "F"
  • Reload memory card "R"
